action.action-desc: Mr. Higgins of Louisiana introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to expand the definition of engage in terrorist activity, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protect Against Terrorist Threats (PATT) Act of 2022.

section.header: Expansion of definition of engage in terrorist activity
section.text: Section 212(a)(3)(B)(iv) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1182(a)(3)(B)(iv)) is amendedâ€”

subclause.text: to threaten, attempt, or conspire to take any action described in subclauses (III) through (VI).
